languages.text: When this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.
languages.original_text: Получив {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в первый раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, существо свирепеет и отвечает на каждую следующую атаку в раунде.

traits.locale_text: When this creature suffers damage the first time in round, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.

When this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.

When this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.

languages.text: Cuando esta criatura sufre daño por primera vez durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, se enfurece y contraataca cada vez subsiguiente que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} ese asalto.
languages.original_text: When this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.

traits.locale_text: Cuando esta criatura sufre daño por primera vez durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, se enfurece y contraataca cada vez subsiguiente que sufre daño ese asalto.

languages.text: 当此生物在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，它会陷入暴怒状态。在本轮结束前每当遭受攻击时，都会进行反击。
languages.original_text: When this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.

traits.locale_text: 当此生物在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次受到伤害时，它会陷入暴怒状态。在本轮结束前每当遭受攻击时，都会进行反击。

languages.text: Lorsque cette créature subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, elle devient enragée et riposte à chaque nouvelle attaque qu'elle subit au cours de ce round.
languages.original_text: When this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque cette créature subit des dégâts pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, elle devient enragée et riposte à chaque nouvelle attaque qu'elle subie au cours de ce round.

languages.text: Erleidet diese Kreatur in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zum ersten Mal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, wird sie wütend und schlägt nach jedem weiteren Angriff in dieser Runde zurück.
languages.original_text: When this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.

traits.locale_text: Wenn diese Kreatur in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zum ersten Mal Schaden erleidet, wird sie wütend und schlägt nach jedem weiteren Angriff in dieser Runde zurück.

languages.text: 生物が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の中で最初に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた場合、激怒し、そのラウンド中の追加攻撃すべてに対して反撃を行う。
languages.original_text: When this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.

traits.locale_text: 生物が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の中で最初にダメージを受けた場合、激怒し、そのラウンド中の追加攻撃すべてに対して反撃を行う。

languages.text: Получив {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в первый раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, существо свирепеет и отвечает на каждую следующую атаку в раунде.
languages.original_text: When this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it becomes enraged and strikes back after every additional attack suffered this round.

traits.locale_text: Получив урон в первый раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, существо свирепеет и отвечает на каждую следующую атаку в раунде.
